history.narrative: Law 1-17 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-58, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 29, 1975 and May 13, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 19, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-23 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
